mapper.insert: insert into place (company_id, place_name, place_description, place_opendays, place_start, place_end, place_addinfo, address_id) values (#{companyId}, #{placeName}, #{placeDescription}, #{placeOpenDays}, #{placeStart}, #{placeEnd}, #{placeAddInfo}, #{addressId})
mapper.update: update place set place_name=#{updateParam.placeName}, place_description=#{updateParam.placeDescription}, place_opendays=#{updateParam.placeOpenDays}, place_start=#{updateParam.placeStart}, place_end=#{updateParam.placeEnd}, place_addinfo=#{updateParam.placeAddInfo}, address_id=#{updateParam.addressId}
